implementations

Class CommentImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • implementations.CommentImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comment

    public class CommentImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Comment
    This class represents a Comment that was created by a CalendarImpl instance and is stored in a SharkKB Information. Please note that Comments itself can only by created by a Calendar.
    See Also:
    CalendarImpl

      Constructor and Description
      CommentImpl(Calendar cal, Appointment app, net.sharkfw.knowledgeBase.Information i)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Appointment getAppointment()

      This method returns the User that created this Comment (if known).

      • CommentImpl

        public CommentImpl(Calendar cal,
                   Appointment app,
                   net.sharkfw.knowledgeBase.Information i)
        Constructor creates a representation of a Comment stored in the passed Information and managed by the passed Calendar.
        Parameters:
        cal - the Calendar that manages this Comment
        app - the Appointment this Comment belongs to
        i - the Information that contains the Comment this instance represents
